ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION

block.text: YӘHYAYA NAZİL OLAN

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION CHP 1
This is the Revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave him to show to his servants the things which must happen soon, which he sent and made known by his angel to his servant, John.

block.text: Bu, İsa Mә...әhyidir. Allah bunu Ona verdi ki, tezliklә...әli hadisә...әri Öz qulları...ın kә...ә İsa Mә...әhadә...әni gördüyü hә...әdә...әhadә...ә bә...әmbә...әrini oxuyan, eşidә...әr vә...әt edә...әr! Çünki vaxt yaxı...ır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: John, to the seven assemblies that are in Asia: Grace to you and peace, from God, who is and who was and who is to come; and from the seven Spirits who are before his throne;

block.text: John, to the seven assemblies that are in Asia: Grace to you and peace, from God, who is and who was and who is to come; and from the seven Spirits who are before his throne;

ReferenceBlocks.text: and from Jesus Christ, the faithful witness, the firstborn of the dead, and the ruler of the kings of the earth. To him who loves us, and washed us from our sins by his blood;

block.text: and from Jesus Christ, the faithful witness, the firstborn of the dead, and the ruler of the kings of the earth. To him who loves us, and washed us from our sins by his blood;

ReferenceBlocks.text: He made us to be a Kingdom, priests to his God and Father; to him be the glory and the dominion forever and ever. Amen.

block.text: He made us to be a Kingdom, priests to his God and Father; to him be the glory and the dominion forever and ever. Amen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, he is coming with the clouds, and every eye will see him, including those who pierced him. All the tribes of the earth will mourn over him. Even so, Amen.

block.text: Budur, O, buludlarla gә...әr göz Onu görә...әk, Hә...әdә...әnlә...ә Onu görә...әk. Yer üzünün bütün tayfaları...ından ötrü vә...әdә...әhadә...ә görә...әsinә...әnzә...әsin belә...әdiyini
eşitdim:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am the Alpha and Omega, the first and the last: and, What you see, write in a book and send to the seven assemblies: to Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamum, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia, and to Laodicea.”

block.text: <<Gördüyünü bir kitaba yaz vә...әmiyyә...ә, yә...ә, İzmirә...ә Laodikeyaya göndә...әnimlә...ә yeddi qı...ında uzun cübbә...әsinә...әşә...әnzә...ә qar kimi ağ, gözlә...ә odlu alov kimi idi;

ReferenceBlocks.text: His feet were like burnished brass, as if it had been refined in a furnace. His voice was like the voice of many waters.

block.text: ayaqları...ış tunc kimi idi, sә...ә gur suları...ında Gә...әn belә...әnin ә...әllә...әn, zә...әtindә...әn vә...әr adamlara dözmә...әn xә...әrdaram. Hә...әrini hә...ә onları...ı olduğunu müә...әn etdin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You have perseverance and have endured for my name's sake, and have not grown weary.

block.text: Sә...әnim adı...ına gә...әn götürә...әyә...әn nikolaçı...ın ә...әllә...ә nifrә...әn; Mә...ә onlara nifrә...әm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies. To him who overcomes I will give to eat of the tree of life, which is in the Paradise of my God.”

block.text: Qulağı...ın cә...әtindә...әyat ağacı...ınaqdan keçә...әziyyә...әkә...әksiniz. Ölüm bahası...ın günlә...ә belә...әnә...әdin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I have a few things against you, because you have there some who hold the teaching of Balaam, who taught Balak to throw a stumbling block before the children of Israel, to eat things sacrificed to idols, and to commit sexual immorality.

block.text: Amma sә...әn bir az şikayә...әliminә...әtdi ki, İsrail övladları...ı büdrә...әrә...әrә...әqdim olunan qurbanları...ı olanlar var.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Repent therefore, or else I am coming to you quickly, and I will make war against them with the sword of my mouth.

block.text: Buna görә...ә tövbә...ә sә...әlib ağzı...ıncla onlarla döyüşә...әyә...әmiyyә...әrә...ә deyir. Qalib gә...әnә...әn gizli saxlanan mannadan verә...әyә...әcә...әm ki, üstündә...әs bilmir.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: “To the angel of the assembly in Thyatira write: The Son of God, who has his eyes like a flame of fire, and his feet are like burnished brass, says these things:”

block.text: <<Tiatirada olan cә...әtin mә...әyinә...әri odlu alova, ayaqları...ış tunca bә...әyә...ә deyir:>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I know your works, your love, faith, service, patient endurance, and that your last works are more than the first.

block.text: <<sә...әmә...әrindә...әhә...әtindә...әtindә...ә dözümündә...әbә...әrin dә...әvvә...әrdә...әndә...әtim var: sә...әmbә...ә imkan verirsә...әnim qulları...ından tövbә...әk istә...әstә...әnlә...ә etdiklә...әmә...әrdә...ә etmә...әlә...әziyyә...ә düçar edә...әyә...әcә...әm. Bütün cә...әtlә...ә bilә...әk ki, insanı...ıran Mә...әm vә...әr birinizә...әmә...әrinizә...ә ә...әz verә...әyә...әrlә...ә, yә...әlimi qә...әyә...әrә...ә Şeytanı...ımsa, elә...ә dә...әcә...әm. Dan ulduzunu da ona verә...әyә...әmiyyә...әrә...ә deyir.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION CHP 3

“And to the angel of the assembly in Sardis write: He who has the seven Spirits of God, and the seven stars says these things: I know your works, that you have a reputation of being alive, but you are dead.

block.text: <<Sardda olan cә...әtin mә...әyinә...ә yeddi ulduza malik Olan belә...әnin ә...әllә...әn xә...әrdaram. Adı...ıb ölmә...ә olan nә...әmlә...әn sә...әmә...әrinin Allahı...ın önündә...ә dә...ә aldı...ına sal. Bunlara riayә...ә tövbә...ә. Әgә...әlә...әyә...ә hansı...ından ә...әyә...әyә...ә Onun mә...әklә...ә adı...ı iqrar edә...әyә...әmiyyә...әrә...ә deyir.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: “To the angel of the assembly in Philadelphia write: He who is holy, he who is true, he who has the key of David, he who opens and no one can shut, and who shuts and no one opens, says these things:”

block.text: <<Filadelfiyada olan cә...әtin mә...әyinә...әddә...ә Haqq Olan, Davudun açarı...ımdan imtina etmә...әn.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, I give of the synagogue of Satan, of those who say they are Jews, and they are not, but lie. Behold, I will make them to come and worship before your feet, and to know that I have loved you.

block.text: İndi isә...әhudi olmadı...ı halda özlә...әhudi adlandı...ına düşsünlә...ә Mә...әni sevdiyimi bilsinlә...әrә...әk Mә...ә riayә...әn. Buna görә...әn dә...әni yer üzündә...әrinә...әlә...әk sı...ından qoruyub saxlayacağam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I am coming quickly! Hold firmly that which you have, so that no one takes your crown.

block.text: Tezliklә...әlirә...әyin varsa, ona bağlı...ı tә...әyә...әk. Onun üzә...ә Allahı...ı olan qoy eşitsin ki, Ruh cә...әtlә...ә nә...әmiyyә...әlә...ә yaz: Amin Olan, sadiq vә...әnşә...ә deyir:>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I know your works, that you are neither cold nor hot. I wish you were cold or hot.

block.text: <<sә...әmә...әrindә...әbә...әn nә...ә dә...ә isti, nә...ә soyuq olub ilı...ıyam, zә...ә heç nә...ә möhtac deyilә...әn ki, zә...ә çı...ına gә...әcә...әm vә...әn onunla, o da Mә...ә birgә...әcә...әlә...ә Mә...ә birgә...әcә...әm; Mә...ә elә...ә qalib gә...ә Onun taxtı...ı olan qoy eşitsin ki, Ruh cә...әtlә...ә nә...ә açı...ı ә...әnzә...әtrafı...ın üstündә...әk, uğultu vә...ә yeddi mә...әl yanı...ın önündә...әnzә...әn şüşә...әniz var idi.
Taxtı...ında önü dә...әrlә...әxluq var idi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The first creature was like a lion, and the second creature like a calf. The third creature had a face like a man, and the fourth was like a flying eagle.

block.text: Birinci mә...әxluq danaya, üçüncü mә...ә, dördüncü mә...әnzә...әxluqdan hә...әxluqları...ın önünә...әr:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Worthy are you, our Lord and God, the Holy One, to receive the glory, the honor, and the power, for you created all things, and because of your desire they existed, and were created!”

block.text: <<Ey bizim Rә...ә Allahı...ız! Sә...әt, şә...әf vә...әt almağa layiqsә...әr şeyi Sә...әr şey Sә...әnlә...әn taxtda Oturanı...ı vә...ә möhürlә...әmçinin gördüm ki, qüdrә...әlә...әslә...әrini qı...ı mә...ә ağsaqqalları...ı götürüb Onun möhürlә...әn. Çünki Sә...әsildin Vә...әr tayfadan, dildә...ә millә...әn olanları...ızla birgә...ә kahinliyә...әrik etdin; Onlar da yer üzünә...әcә...әxluqları...ız mә...әk gördüm vә...әsini eşitdim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: saying with a loud voice,

block.text: Onlar uca sә...ә deyirdi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Worthy is the Lamb who has been killed to receive the power, wealth, wisdom, strength, honor, glory, and blessing!”

block.text: <<Kә...әti, sә...әti, hikmә...әti, Şә...әfi, izzә...ә alqı...ı Almağa layiqdir>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I heard every created thing which is in heaven, on the earth, under the earth, on the sea, and everything in them, saying,

block.text: Hә...әn göydә...ә, yer altı...ın belә...ә Quzuya ә...әdi olaraq Alqı...ıya izin verildi ki, yer üzündә...ә insanlara bir-birini qı...ınc verildi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he opened the third seal, I heard the third living creature saying,

block.text: Quzu üçüncü möhürü açanda üçüncü canlı...ı mә...әsin belә...ә şә...әxluqun dediyini eşitdim:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Come and see!”

block.text: <<gә...әngdә...ә oturan atlı...ıq, azar vә...әki vә...әlamı...ı gördüm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They cried with a loud voice, saying,

block.text: Onlar uca sә...ә fә...әddә...ә haqq olan Pә...әrdigar, nә...ә etmә...ә yaşayanlardan qanı...ı, böyük adamlar, sә...әrdә...әr, varlı...ı vә...әr?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION CHP 7
After this, I saw four angels standing at the four corners of the earth. They were holding the four winds of the earth, so that no wind would blow on the earth, or on the sea, or on any tree.

block.text: Bundan sonra mә...ә dayanan dörd mә...әk gördüm. Onlar yer üzünün dörd külә...ә quru, nә...әniz vә...ә dә...ә yel ә...әrә...әn qalxan başqa bir mә...әk dә...ә malik idi. O, uca sә...ә quruya vә...әnizә...әlә...әyә...ә qә...әr quruya, dә...ә vә...әnmiş şә...әrin sayı...ın bütün qә...әlә...әn 144,000 nә...әr möhürlә...әhuda qә...әsindә...әnmiş nә...әr; Ruven qә...әsindә...әfә...әbilә...әn 12,000 nә...әr;

ReferenceBlocks.text: of the tribe of Asher twelve thousand, of the tribe of Naphtali twelve thousand, of the tribe of Manasseh twelve thousand,

block.text: Aşer qә...әsindә...әfә...әbilә...әn 12,000 nә...әr; Menaşşe qә...әsindә...әfә...әbilә...әn 12,000 nә...әr; Levi qә...әsindә...әfә...әbilә...әn 12,000 nә...әr;

ReferenceBlocks.text: of the tribe of Zebulun twelve thousand, of the tribe of Joseph twelve thousand, of the tribe of Benjamin were sealed twelve thousand.

block.text: Zevulun qә...әsindә...әfә...әbilә...әn 12,000 nә...әr; Binyamin qә...әsindә...әnmiş nә...әr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: After these things I looked, and behold, a great multitude, which no man could number, out of every nation and of all tribes, peoples, and languages, standing before the throne and before the Lamb, dressed in white robes, with palm branches in their hands.

block.text: Bundan sonra mә...әr millә...әn, hә...әr xalqdan vә...әr dildә...әsin saya bilmә...әcә...ә taxtı...ıb. Onlar ağ xalat geyinib, ә...әrindә...әslә...әr:

block.characterId: multitude from all nations, tribes, peoples, languages

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: multitude from all nations, tribes, peoples, languages
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Salvation be to our God, who sits on the throne, and to the Lamb!”

block.text: <<Xilas taxtda oturan Allahı...ıza vә...әxsusdur!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: All the angels were standing around the throne, the elders, and the four living creatures; and they fell on their faces before his throne, and worshiped God,
saying,

block.text: Bütün mә...әklә...ә taxtı...ın vә...әxluqun ә...ә üzüstә...ә qapanaraq Allaha sә...ә edib
dedilә...әbә...әt, hikmә...әrә...әt vә...әt olsun! Amin!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: One of the elders answered, saying to me,

block.text: Bu arada ağsaqqallardan biri mә...әn soruşdu:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “These who are arrayed in white robes, who are they, and from where did they come?”

block.text: <<Ağ xalat geyinmiş bu şә...әr kimdir vә...әliblә...әn bilә...әn>>.O mә...ә dedi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “These are those who came out of the great tribulation. They washed their robes, and made them white in the Lamb's blood.

block.text: <<Bunlar böyük ә...әtdә...әlә...әrdir. Onlar öz xalatları...ın üzә...ә mә...әn salacaq.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They will never be hungry, neither thirsty any more; neither will the sun beat on them, nor any heat.

block.text: Onlar bir daha nә...ә dә...әş vә...әyat suyunun qaynaqları...ı silә...әk>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION CHP 8
When he opened the seventh seal, there was silence in heaven for about half an hour.

block.text: Quzu yeddinci möhürü açanda göydә...әxminә...әn Allahı...ı ilә...ә taxtı...ı ilә...ә mә...әyin ә...әn Allahı...ı. Göy gurultusu, uğultu, şimşә...ә zә...әlә...әlә...әlә...ә od ә...әlә...әlib yer üzünә...ә biri, ağacları...ı. Onda
sanki böyük bir dağ odla yanaraq dә...ә atı...ı. Dә...ә biri qana döndü.

ReferenceBlocks.text: One third of the living creatures which were in the sea died. One third of the ships were destroyed.

block.text: Dә...ә olan canlı...ın üçdә...ә su qaynaqları...ın üstünә...ә biri yovşana döndü. Çoxlu adam sulardan öldü, çünki sular acı...ı. Onda
günә...ә ulduzları...ı. Gündüzün üçdә...әnin dә...ә o qә...әri işı...ında uçan bir qartal gördüm vә...әslә...ә dediyini eşitdim:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Woe! Woe! Woe for those who dwell on the earth, because of the other voices of the trumpets of the three angels, who are yet to sound!”

block.text: <<Şeypurları...ı çalacaq o biri üç mә...әyin şeypur sә...әrindә...ә yaşayanları...ına!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION CHP 9
The fifth angel sounded, and I saw a
star from the sky which had fallen to the earth. The key to the pit of the abyss was given to him.

block.text: Beşinci mә...әk şeypurunu çaldı...ı ona verildi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He opened the pit of the abyss, and smoke went up out of the pit, like the smoke from a burning furnace. The sun and the air were darkened because of the smoke from the pit.

block.text: O, dibsiz dә...ә enә...ә quyudan iri bir kürә...ә bә...әr tüstü çı...ı. Günә...ә hava quyudan çı...ı öldürmә...әn onlara beş ay işgә...ә versinlә...әncә...әqrә...әncә...ә bә...әyir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In those days people will seek death, and will in no way find it. They will desire to die, and death will flee from them.

block.text: O günlә...ә insanlar ölüm axtaracaq, amma tapmayacaqlar. Özlә...ә ölüm arzulayacaqlar, amma ölüm onlardan qaçacaq.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The shapes of the locusts were like horses prepared for war. On their heads were something like golden crowns, and their faces were like people's faces.

block.text: Çә...әlә...ә hazı...ıl tac var idi, üzlә...ә insan üzü kimi idi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They had hair like women's hair, and their teeth were like those of lions.

block.text: Onları...ın sә...ә bә...әyirdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They have tails like those of scorpions, and stings. In their tails they have power to harm men for five months.

block.text: Onları...ı vә...әrlә...ә güclә...әrә...ә bilә...әr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They have over them as king the angel of the abyss. His name in Hebrew is “Abaddon,” but in Greek, he has the name “Apollyon.”

block.text: Dibsiz dә...әlә...әrindә...ә <<Avaddon>>, yunanca <<Apollion>> idi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The first woe is past. Behold, there are still two woes coming after this.

block.text: Birinci bә...әla gә...әlә...әn Allahı...ında bağlanan dörd mә...әyi burax>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The four angels were freed who had been prepared for that hour and day and month and year, so that they might kill one third of mankind.

block.text: Hә...ә o il üçün hazı...ış dörd mә...әk buraxı...ı eşitdim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Thus I saw the horses in the vision, and those who sat on them, having breastplates of fiery red, hyacinth blue, and sulfur yellow; and the heads of lions. Out of their mouths
proceed fire, smoke, and sulfur.

block.text: Mә...ә atları...ın od, tünd göy vә...әngindә...әri var idi, atları...ı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By these three plagues were one third of mankind killed: by the fire, the smoke, and the sulfur, which proceeded out of their mouths.

block.text: Bu üç bә...әni onları...ın üçdә...әlak oldu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the power of the horses is in their mouths, and in their tails. For their tails are like serpents, and have heads, and with them they harm.

block.text: Çünki atları...ıb sağ qalan adamlar öz ә...әri ilә...әltdiklә...әrdә...ә etmә...әr. Cinlә...ә vә...әyә...әyә...әyә...әrә...әcdә...әkdә...әl çә...әdilә...әmçinin onlar nә...әrindә...ә sehrbazlı...ından, nә...әxlaqsı...ından tövbә...әr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION CHP 10
I saw a mighty angel coming down out of the sky, clothed with a cloud. A rainbow was on his head. His face was like the sun,
and his feet like pillars of fire.

block.text: Mә...әn enә...әlә...ә başı...ın üstündә...әşә...әnzә...ә açı...ış kiçik bir tumar var idi. O, sağ ayağı...ı dә...ә, sol ayağı...ı isә...әriltisinә...әnzә...әslә...әndә...әsi ilә...әn yazmağa hazı...ı yazma>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The angel whom I saw standing on the sea and on the land lifted up his right hand to the sky,

block.text: Onda dә...ә vә...әlә...әlini göyә...әrә...әbә...ә oradakı...ı, yeri vә...әnizi vә...әrә...әt verilmә...әcә...әlә...әr Allahı...ı götür>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I went to the angel, telling him to give me the little book. He said to me,

block.text: Mә...ә mә...әyin yanı...ı mә...ә versin. O mә...ә dedi:

block.characterId: angel standing on sea and land

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: angel standing on sea and land
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Take it, and eat it up. It will make your stomach bitter, but in your mouth it will be as sweet as honey.”

block.text: <<Onu götür, ye. O sә...әdә...ә acı...ında isә...әn tumarı...ımda bal kimi şirin idi, amma onu yeyә...әn sonra mә...әmdә...әnә...ә dә...әn gә...әk yenә...ә çoxlu xalq, millә...ә padşah barә...ә peyğә...әrlik edә...әn>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION CHP 11
A reed like a rod was given to me. Someone said,

block.text: Mә...ә ә...ә mә...ә deyildi:

block.characterId: angel or messenger (Greek variant: someone speaking to John)

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: angel or messenger (Greek variant: someone speaking to John)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Rise, and measure God's temple, and the altar, and those who worship in it.

block.text: <<Qalx Allahı...ı ölç vә...әcdә...әnlә...әbә...әyә...әzә...ә alma vә...ә. Çünki ora başqa millә...әrә...ә onlar müqә...әs şә...әri qı...ır. Belә...ә onlara zә...әr vurmaq istә...әn hә...әs bu cür öldürülmә...әmbә...әri günlә...әmçinin onları...ı qana döndә...әyә...ә yer üzünә...әdiklә...әdә...әr cür bә...әtirmә...ә ixtiyarı...ıxan vә...әcә...ә onları...ın Rә...ә çarmı...ına yol vermә...әcә...әr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Those who dwell on the earth rejoice over them, and they will be glad. They will give gifts to one another, because these two prophets tormented those who dwell on the earth.

block.text: Yer üzündә...әcә...ә bir-birlә...ә hә...әlә...әrә...әk. Çünki bu iki peyğә...әr yer üzündә...әmin üç gün yarı...ın!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: They went up into heaven in the cloud, and their enemies saw them.

block.text: deyә...әs eşitdilә...ә buludun içindә...ә qalxdı...ı isә...әki Allahı...ında oturan iyirmi dörd ağsaqqal üzüstә...ә qapanı...ın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The nations were angry, and your wrath came, as did the time for the dead to be judged, and to give your bondservants the prophets, their reward, as well as to the saints, and those who fear your name, to the small and the great; and to destroy those who destroy the earth.”

block.text: Millә...әr qә...әblә...әnin dә...әzә...әldi. Ölülә...ә etmә...әnin qulları...ın göydә...әbә...ә Onun Әhd sandı...ı orada zahir oldu. Onda şimşә...әlzә...ә vә...әldi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION CHP 12
A great sign was seen in heaven: a woman clothed with the sun, and the moon under her feet, and on her head a crown of twelve stars.

block.text: Göydә...әlamә...әşi ә...ә geyinmiş, ayaqları...ında ay vә...ә idi vә...ә idi, ağrı...ıq edә...әk>>.Bu uşaq Allahı...ı. Orada onun min iki yüz altmı...ın önündә...ә-gündüz tә...әndirә...әnara atı...ı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They overcame him because of the Lamb's blood, and because of the word of their testimony. They didn't love their life, even to death.

block.text: Onlar Quzunun qanı...ına! Çünki iblis böyük hiddә...ә yanı...ıb>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the dragon saw that he was thrown down to the earth, he persecuted the woman who gave birth to the male child.

block.text: Әjdaha yer üzünә...әndә...ә – öz yerinә...ә orada, ilandan kә...ә yarı...ın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The earth helped the woman, and the earth opened its mouth and swallowed up the river which the dragon spewed out of his mouth.

block.text: Lakin quru qadı...ına qә...әblә...әslindә...әmrlә...ә riayә...әn vә...әdә...әhadә...әn başqaları...ı üzә...ә dayandı...ıxan on buynuzlu vә...әhşi heyvan gördüm. Onun buynuzları...ın üstündә...әrindә...ә küfr olan adlar yazı...ırx iki ay icra etmә...әmçinin mә...әninә...әni göydә...әskә...әsin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It was given to him to make war with the saints, and to overcome them. Authority over every tribe, people, language, and nation was given to him.

block.text: Ona izin verildi ki, müqә...әslә...ә döyüşüb onlara qalib gә...әmçinin ona bütün tayfalar, xalqlar, dillә...ә millә...әr üzә...ә sә...әt verildi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All who dwell on the earth will worship him, everyone whose name has not been written from the foundation of the world in the book of life of the Lamb who has been killed.

block.text: Kә...әyat kitabı...ı ona sә...ә edә...әk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone has an ear, let him hear.

block.text: Kimin qulağı...ı olsun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw another beast coming up out of the earth. He had two horns like a lamb, and he spoke like a dragon.

block.text: Mә...әn çı...ı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He exercises all the authority of the first beast in his presence. He makes the earth and those who dwell in it to worship the first beast, whose fatal wound was healed.

block.text: O, birinci vә...әlahiyyә...ә icra edir, yer üzünü vә...әmin vә...әcdә...әyә...әcbur edir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He performs great signs, even making fire come down out of the sky to the earth in the sight of people.

block.text: İkinci vә...әlamә...әr göstә...әtta insanları...ın önündә...әrilmә...ә izin verilmiş ә...әtlә...ә yer üzündә...әmin vә...әtinә...әfә...әk qüdrә...әt dә...ә ona sә...ә etmә...әn hә...әsin öldürülmә...әmr etsin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He causes all, the small and the great, the rich and the poor, and the free and the slave, to be given marks on their right hands, or on their foreheads.

block.text: İkinci vә...әri vә...әri, varlı...ı vә...ә qulları...ı tә...әn sayı...ımayan bir kә...ә alı...ı var, qoy bu vә...әxsus sayı...ır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION CHP 14
I saw, and behold, the Lamb standing on Mount Zion, and with him a number, one hundred forty-four thousand, having his name, and the name of his Father, written on their foreheads.

block.text: Mә...ә 144,000 nә...әr var idi. Onları...ına vә...әnzә...әs eşitdim. Eşitdiyim sә...әng çalanları...ınca gә...әrә...әxlaqsı...ın coşğun şә...әtlә...ә içirtmişdi>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Another angel, a third, followed them, saying with a great voice,

block.text: Bunları...ınca üçüncü bir mә...әk dә...әlә...әk uca sә...ә deyirdi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If anyone worships the beast and his image, and receives a mark on his forehead, or on his hand,

block.text: <<Kim vә...ә onun surә...ә sә...ә edib öz alnı...ın yaxud ә...әbul edә...ә,

ReferenceBlocks.text: he also will drink of the wine of the wrath of God, which is prepared unmixed in the cup of his anger. He will be tormented with fire and sulfur in the presence of the holy angels, and in the presence of the Lamb.

block.text: o da Allahı...ıq tapmayacaq>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This calls for patient endurance on the part of the saints, those who keep the commandments of God, and the faith of Jesus.”

block.text: Allahı...ına sadiq qalan müqә...әslә...әrә...әn belә...әn bir sә...әbdә...әnlә...ә bә...әli,>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: says the Spirit,

block.text: Ruh deyir:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “that they may rest from their labors; for their works follow with them.”

block.text: <<onlar zә...әtlә...әn ayrı...ıl tac vә...әlindә...әlә...ә mә...әddә...ә Oturana uca sә...ә dedi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Send forth your sickle, and reap; for the hour to reap has come; for the harvest of the earth is ripe!”

block.text: <<Orağı...ı işә...ә biç. Çünki yer üzündә...әkin yetişdiyi üçün biçin zamanı...ı vә...әnlә...ә qә...әr qalxaraq 1600 stadiyә...әrabә...әsafә...ә axdı...ına aid saya qalib gә...әnlә...әllә...ә Allahı...ı, Sә...әdalә...ә hә...әbb, kim Sә...әn qorxmaz, Kim Sә...әtlә...әz? Çünki yalnı...ı mә...әlә...ә ә...әdi var olan Allahı...ın hiddә...әsini yer üzünә...әlә...әsini quruya boşaltdı...ı vә...ә onlar bu bә...ә edә...әr, lakin tövbә...әtlә...әdilә...әlә...әsini vә...ә onun padşahlı...ıq bürüdü. Adamlar iztirabdan dillә...әrinә...ә öz iztirab vә...ә göylә...әr, lakin öz ә...әllә...әn tövbә...әdilә...әlә...әsini böyük Fә...ә onun suyu qurudu ki, gündoğandan gә...әn padşahlar üçün yol açı...ın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw coming
out of the mouth of the dragon, and
out of the mouth of the beast, and
out of the mouth of the false prophet, three unclean spirits, something like frogs.

block.text: Gördüm ki,
ә...әhşi heyvanı...ından vә...әmbә...әnzә...әmiz ruh çı...ır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For they are spirits of demons, performing signs; They go forth to the kings of the whole inhabited earth, to gather them together for the war of that great day of God, the Almighty.

block.text: Bunlar ә...әtlә...әrә...ә bütün dünyanı...ına gedirlә...ә baş verә...әk döyüşә...әlirә...әzә...әk ayı...ır!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He gathered them together into the place which is called in Hebrew, Megiddo.

block.text: Bu ruhlar padşahları...ı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The seventh poured out his bowl into the air. A loud voice came forth out of the temple of heaven, from the throne, saying,

block.text: Yeddinci mә...әk öz nimçә...ә mә...әddә...әn uca bir sә...әldi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is done!”

block.text: <<Tamam oldu!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: There were lightnings, sounds, and thunders; and there was a great earthquake, such as was not since there were men on the earth, so great an earthquake, so mighty.

block.text: Onda şimşә...ә böyük bir zә...әlә...әlzә...ә elә...ә yaşamağa başladı...ı dövrdә...әri bundan böyüyü olmamı...ı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The great city was divided into three parts, and the cities of the nations fell. Babylon the great was remembered in the sight of God, to give to her the cup of the wine of the fierceness of his wrath.

block.text: Böyük şә...әr üç yerә...ә millә...әrin şә...әrlә...әrә...әn böyük Babil yada salı...ı ilә...ә dağlar yox oldu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Great hailstones, about the weight of a talent, came down out of the sky on people. People blasphemed God because of the plague of the hail, for this plague is exceedingly severe.

block.text: Göydә...ә hә...әsinin çә...әnә...әri yağdı...ın üzә...ә oturmuş bә...ә barә...ә çı...ı. Orada mә...ә üstündә...әngli bir vә...ә oturub.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The woman was dressed in purple and scarlet, and decked with gold and precious stones and pearls. She had in her hand a golden cup full of abominations and the impurities of the sexual immorality of the earth.

block.text: Qadı...ı vә...әngli paltar geyinmiş, qı...ıl, qiymә...ә mirvari ilә...әzә...әlindә...әnc şeylә...ә öz ә...ә dolu qı...ıl kasa var idi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And on her forehead a name was written,

block.text: Alnı...ı olan böyük Babil>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw the woman drunken with the blood of the saints, and with the blood of the martyrs of Jesus. When I saw her, I wondered with great amazement.

block.text: Mә...әddә...әrin qanı...ıxmaq üzrә...әlaka gedir. Yer üzündә...ә dünya yaranandan bә...әyat kitabı...ır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Here is the mind that has wisdom. The seven heads are seven mountains, on which the woman sits.

block.text: Bu işdә...әpә...әm dә...әri isә...әlә...әlmә...ә gә...әndә...ә qı...ır. O, yeddi padşahdan biridir vә...әlaka gedir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The ten horns that you saw are ten kings who have received no kingdom as yet, but they receive authority as kings, with the beast, for one hour.

block.text: Gördüyün on buynuz hә...ә padşahlı...ır. Onlar vә...ә sә...әti ә...ә alı...ıq edә...әklә...әti var, öz qüdrә...ә sә...әtlә...әhşi heyvana tә...әcә...әr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These will war against the Lamb, and the Lamb will overcome them, for he is Lord of lords, and King of kings. They also will overcome who are with him, called and chosen and faithful.”

block.text: Onlar Quzu ilә...әcә...әlә...әk. Çünki O, ağaları...ış, seçilmiş vә...әxslә...әlә...әnә...әnin üzә...ә oturduğunu gördüyün sular – xalqlar, kütlә...әr, millә...әr vә...әrdir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The ten horns which you saw, and the beast, these will hate the prostitute. They will make her desolate, and will make her naked, and will eat her flesh, and will burn her utterly with fire.

block.text: Gördüyün vә...ә on buynuz isә...әyә...әt edә...әk onu soyub çı...ıracaq.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For God has put in their hearts to do what he has in mind. To be of one mind, and to give their kingdom to the beast, until the words of God should be accomplished.

block.text: Çünki Allah bunu onları...ın niyyә...ә yetirsinlә...әmfikir olub Onun sözlә...әdә...әhşi heyvana tә...әr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The woman whom you saw is the great city, which reigns over the kings of the earth.”

block.text: Gördüyün qadı...ı üzә...ә padşahlı...ı ilә...әslә...әrin mә...әni, Hә...әmiz ruhun sı...ın tacirlә...әhvә...әrә...ә qazanı...ı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Return to her just as she returned, and repay her double as she did, and according to her works. In the cup which she mixed, mix to her double.

block.text: O nә...ә, Siz dә...әvә...ә ona belә...әllә...әvә...әrabı...ısa,

ReferenceBlocks.text: ‘I sit as queen, and am no widow, and will in no way see mourning.’

block.text: Ona o qә...әr dә...әncә...ә yas verin. Çünki ürә...ә deyir: “Mә...әlә...ә taxtı...ılacaq. Çünki onu mühakimә...әn Rә...әtlidir>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The kings of the earth, who committed sexual immorality and lived wantonly with her, will weep and wail over her, when they look at the
smoke of her burning,

block.text: Onunla ә...әn vә...әhvә...әrә...ә yaşayan yer üzünün padşahları...ıxan tüstünü görә...ә onun üçün ağlayı...ına, böyük şә...әr, Möhkә...әhә...ә cә...әri dә...әtli daşlar vә...әri; incә...әtan, ipә...ә al rә...әr cür ә...әn, ә...әtli ağacdan, tuncdan, dә...әn vә...әrmә...әn olan hә...әşyanı...ın, hil, buxur, ә...ә kündürü; şә...ә buğdanı...ır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They cried out to the city:

block.text: Onlar deyirlә...әyinin arzuladı...ı bә...әlә...әlindә...әs onları...ına, İncә...әtan, tünd qı...ıxan tüstüyә...әr:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What is like the great city?”

block.text: <<Hansı...ına toz töküb fә...ә ağlayı...ın çox qiymә...ә Varlandı...ı böyük şә...әr! Çünki bir saat içindә...әr, Müqә...әslә...әvarilә...ә peyğә...әrlә...әtirdi.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: A mighty angel took up a stone like a great millstone and cast it into the sea, saying,

block.text: Bir güclü mә...әk dә...әrә...әnizә...әhә...ә Belә...әyә...әk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The voice of harpists, minstrels, flute players, and trumpeters will be heard no more at all in you. No craftsman, of whatever craft, will be found any more at all in you. The sound of a mill will be heard no more at all in you.

block.text: Çә...әnnilә...әk vә...әsi Artı...ıq sә...әn gә...әyә...әk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The light of a lamp will shine no more at all in you. The voice of the bridegroom and of the bride will be heard no more at all in you; for your merchants were the princes of the earth; for with your sorcery all the nations were deceived.

block.text: Çı...ıq sә...ә görünmә...әcә...әy-gә...әdası...ıq sә...әn gә...әyә...әk. Çünki sә...әrin Yer üzünün böyük adamları...ı ilә...әni mühakimә...әbbә...әmd edin! Fahişә...әn çı...ı mә...ә qapanaraq taxtda oturan Allaha sә...ә edib dedi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Amen! Hallelujah!”

block.text: <<Amin! Rә...ә hә...ә bir sә...әldi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Give praise to our God, all you his servants, you who fear him, the small and the great!”

block.text: <<Ey Onun bütün qulları...ı mә...әn böyük bir kütlә...ә güclü göy gurultusunun sә...ә bә...әr bir sә...ә eşitdim. Bu sә...әbbә...әmd edin! Çünki Külli-İxtiyar Rә...әlin sevinib şad olaq, Onu izzә...әndirә...әlini özünü hazı...ıb.>>

block.characterId: voice of great crowd, like roar of many waters, loud thunderclaps

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: voice of great crowd, like roar of many waters, loud thunderclaps
ReferenceBlocks.text: “It was given to her that she would array herself in bright, pure, fine linen.”

block.text: Bu onun parlaq, təmiz, gözəl keten ki, o ki array özü verilmişdir."

ReferenceBlocks.text: (For the fine linen is the righteous acts of the saints.)
He said to me,

block.text: (Gözəl kətan olan saints olan saleh aktları...ır!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to me,

block.text: Yenә...ә mә...ә dedi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “These are true words of God.”

block.text: <<Bunlar Allahı...ına düşdüm. Amma o mә...ә dedi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Look! Don't do it! I am a fellow bondservant with you and with your brothers who hold the testimony of Jesus. Worship God, for the testimony of Jesus is the Spirit of Prophecy.”

block.text: <<Yox, olmaz! Mә...ә sә...ә vә...әdә...әhadә...әn qardaşları...ında çoxlu sayda kiçik tac var vә...әrindә...әn başqa heç kә...әdiyi bir ad yazı...ıb.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He is clothed in a garment sprinkled with blood. His name is called “The Word of God.”

block.text: O, qana batmı...ınca gedirdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Out of his mouth proceeds a sharp, double-edged sword, that with it he should strike the nations. He will rule them with an iron rod. He treads the winepress of the fierceness of the wrath of God, the Almighty.

block.text: Onun ağzı...ıq edә...әk>>. Külli-İxtiyar Allahı...ı Özü tapdalayacaq.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He has on his garment and on his thigh a name written,

block.text: Onun paltarı...ın vә...ә bu ad yazı...ıb:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “KING OF KINGS, AND LORD OF LORDS.”

block.text: <<Padşahları...ı vә...әşdә...әlә...ә gördüm. O, uca sә...ә nida edib göyün ortası...ın böyük ziyafә...ә gә...ә yı...ın, sә...әrdә...әrin, igidlә...әtini, atları...ın vә...ә kiçiklә...әtini yeyә...әn gördüm ki, vә...ә onları...ıb.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The beast was taken, and with him the false prophet who worked the signs in his sight, with which he deceived those who had received the mark of the beast and those who worshiped his image.
These two were thrown alive into the lake of fire that burns with sulfur.

block.text: Vә...ә ә...әtlә...әrmiş, bunlarla onun damğası...ı qә...әtinә...әcdә...әnlә...әmbә...ә yaxalandı...ın belindә...әlak oldu. Bütün quşlar da onları...ı – iblis vә...әn o qә...әtinә...әncirlә...әrinliyә...ә qapı...ıb möhürlә...әnә...әdә...әtlә...әsin. Bundan sonra isә...әtә...әlidir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw thrones, and they sat on them, and judgment was given to them. I saw the souls of those who had been beheaded for the testimony of Jesus, and for the word of God, and such as didn't worship the beast nor his image, and didn't receive the mark on their forehead and on their hand. They lived, and reigned with Christ for a thousand years.

block.text: Taxtları...ı verildi. İsa barә...ә şә...әt vә...әlamı...ı da gördüm. Vә...ә onun surә...ә sә...ә etmә...ә ә...әrinә...әbul etmә...әr. Onlar dirilib Mә...ә birgә...әdir. Qalan ölülә...ә min il bitmә...ә dirilmә...әdә...әnlә...әxtiyar vә...әddә...әrindә...әlahiyyә...ә, onlar Allahı...ıq edә...әk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And after the thousand years, Satan will be released from his prison,

block.text: Min il bitә...әn sonra Şeytan atı...ıxacaq ki, yer üzünün dörd tә...әfindә...әtlә...ә Maqoqu aldadı...ılar. Lakin göydә...ә vә...ә yalançı...ı yerә...ә atı...ı. Bunlar gecә...әbә...әncә...әkә...әk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw a great white throne, and him who sat on it, from whose face the
earth and the heaven fled away. There was found no place for them.

block.text: Böyük ağ taxt vә...ә Oturanı...ı vә...әn gördüm ki, böyükdә...ә qә...әr ölülә...ә dayanı...ı. Ölülә...әsasә...әmә...әrinә...ә mühakimә...әniz öz içindә...әri, ölüm vә...әr diyarı...ı odlu gölә...әyat kitabı...ıq yox idi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw the holy city, New Jerusalem, coming down out of heaven from God, prepared like a bride adorned for her husband.

block.text: Mә...әddә...әhә...әlimin göydә...әhә...әyi üçün bә...әdilmiş gә...ә deyә...әs eşitdim:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, God's dwelling is with people, and he will dwell with them, and they will be his people, and God himself will be with them as their God.

block.text: <<Budur, Allahı...ır. Allah onlarla birgә...әskә...әcә...ә vә...әvvә...әr keçib getdi>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who sits on the throne said,

block.text: Taxtda Oturan dedi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, I am making all things new.”

block.text: <<Budur, Mә...әr şeyi yenidә...ә dedi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Write, for these words are faithful and true.”

block.text: <<Yaz, çünki bu sözlә...ә hә...әnә...ә Omeqa, Başlanğı...ın üstündә...әbilә...әkk olunmuşdu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: On the east were three gates; and on the north three gates; and on the south three gates; and on the west three gates.

block.text: Şә...ә üç darvaza, şimalda üç darvaza, cә...ә qә...ә üç darvaza var idi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The wall of the city had twelve foundations, and on them twelve names of the twelve Apostles of the Lamb.

block.text: Şә...әr divarı...ın on iki tә...әli var idi vә...әmә...әrin üstündә...әvarisinin adı...ışan mә...әyin ә...ә şә...әri, oranı...ı şә...ә idi vә...ә bә...әrdir. Mә...әk qamı...ın uzunluğu, eni vә...әrabә...әhә...әlә...ә etdiyi insan ölçüsünә...ә 144 qulac idi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The construction of its wall was jasper. The city was pure gold, like pure glass.

block.text: Divar yә...әm daşı...ın mә...әdi Külli-İxtiyar Rә...ә Quzudur.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The city has no need for the sun, neither of the moon, to shine, for the very glory of God illuminated it, and its lamp is the Lamb.

block.text: Şә...әrin işı...ı üçün nә...әşә...ә dә...әtlә...әhә...әzә...әk, yer üzünün padşahları...ın vә...ә şә...әrin baş küçә...әr iki tayı...ı var idi. O ağac hә...ә gә...әtlә...ә şә...әk üçündür.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There will be no curse any more. The throne of God and of the Lamb will be in it, and his servants serve him.

block.text: Daha lә...әtlә...әn heç bir şey olmayacaq. Allahı...ı Ona ibadә...әcә...әcә...ә olmayacaq, heç kә...ә günә...әbb Allah onlara işı...ı vә...әqiqidir. Peyğә...әrlә...әn Rә...әlә...әrib ki, Öz qulları...ın peyğә...әrlik sözlә...ә riayә...әn kә...ә bә...әn Yә...ә gördüm. Eşidib gördükdә...әnә...әrә...әlә...ә sә...ә etmә...әnә...әn sә...ә, peyğә...әr qardaşları...ın peyğә...әrlik sözlә...әmә...әn qoy daha da haqsı...ıq etsin. Murdar olan daha da murdarlansı...ır Mә...әm!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Blessed are those who do his commandments, that they may have the right to the tree of life, and may enter in by the gates into the city.

block.text: Xalatları...ı günahdan tә...әyә...әr nә...әxtiyardı...ızlar, qatillә...әrә...әr vә...әr kә...ә kә...ә deyir: <<Mә...әlә...әrdim ki, cә...әtlә...ә aid olan bu şә...әti sizә...әn Davudun Kökü vә...әsli, parlaq Dan Ulduzuyam>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Spirit and the bride say,

block.text: Ruh da, gә...ә deyir:

block.characterId: Holy Spirit, the/bride, the (referring to the Church)

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: Holy Spirit, the/bride, the (referring to the Church)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Come!”

block.text: <<Gә...әn dә...әl!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who is thirsty, let him come. He who desires, let him take the water of life freely.

block.text: Susayan qoy gә...әn hә...ә götürsün.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I testify to everyone who hears the words of the prophecy of this book, if anyone adds to them, may God add to him the plagues which are written in this book.

block.text: Mә...әmbә...әrini eşidә...әr kә...ә xә...әrdarlı...ı götürә...әk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who testifies these things says,

block.text: Bunlara şә...әt edә...әli, tezliklә...әlirә...әl, ya Rә...әbb İsanı...ıya yar olsun! Amin.
